cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.RO, cs.SY

This paper is about a novel algorithm for cooperative multi-agent reinforcement learning, which falls under the subfield of machine learning. The algorithm involves learning a hierarchical policy tree, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-category of reinforcement learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the coordination of multiple agents, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA). Additionally, the algorithm involves stochastic actor-critic methods, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the decentralization of policies, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-category of robotics (cs.RO) or control systems (cs.SY). Overall, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.AI, followed by cs.MA, cs.RO, and cs.SY.
